headline: Is Union Pacific (UNP) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Union Pacific's current share price still offers value, this article walks through what the numbers say and how they fit together. The stock last closed at US$228.44, with a 7 day return of a 1.5% decline, a 30 day return of a 4.8% decline, and a 1 year return of 3.1%, which may have some investors reassessing the balance between opportunity and risk. headline: BNSF and CN want UP, NS to produce more merger documents
summary: BNSF Railway and Canadian National tell U.S. regulators that Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern are withholding crucial documents needed to properly evaluate their proposed transcontinental merger. The post BNSF and CN want UP, NS to produce more merger documents appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: CN Files Motion to Force Disclosure in UP-NS Merger Review
summary: Incomplete Application Prevents Those Impacted from Assessing Competition HarmsHOMEWOOD, Ill., Jan. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CN (TSX: CNR) (NYSE: CNI) today announced that it has filed a motion with the Surface Transportation Board (STB) to compel additional information in relation to the proposed merger agreement between Union Pacific (UP) and Norfolk Southern (NS).
